title: Healthy tuna pasta with salad
description: In ten minutes, you can have a delicious, high-protein, low-fat tuna pasta supper.Each serving provides 312kcal, 18g protein, 25g carbohydrates (of which 6g sugars), 14g fat (of which 4g saturates)	7.5g fibre and 1.4g salt.
ingredients: 150g/5oz whole wheat pasta, cooked according to packet instructions (to al dente) and drained
3 carrots, grated or sliced into ribbons using a vegetable peeler
1 cucumber, seeds removed and grated or sliced into ribbons using a vegetable peeler
